attributionInfo.brokerName: Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices Kee Realty Bham

data.description: Welcome Home to this beautiful Lathrup Village brick ranch. Completely renovated in 2017 and lovingly maintained, this home will be the perfect fit for you and yours. Step inside and be greeted by the open concept living. With TONS of natural light pouring in through the massive picture windows, even on those gloomy days, your home will still be filled with light. Enjoy plenty of space and seating in the living room with the first of two fireplaces in the home. Host your biggest gatherings with ease as guests pass between the living room, open dining area, and kitchen. Set up shop for easy breakfast meals at the spacious two tier peninsula complete with stools and a feature not often seen; a garbage shoot built right into the counter top.  All appliances stay in the kitchen, including the brand new microwave. Down the hall are the three generously sized bedrooms and full bathroom. With closets everywhere, you will have no lack of space here. Check out the sprawling basement with a massive partially finished main room, incredible game, media, or (insert dream room here) space complete with the second fireplace. A storage room, full bathroom, and giant laundry/mechanical room also provide ample storage for the home. Outside, the privacy fence helps to create your own personal park. With beautiful mature trees, tons of space, and a covered patio, let your imagination run as wild as the kids and dogs will be. The attached garage provides easy access to the home and the driveway has plenty of space for extra cars, toys, and fun. Roof, Furnace, and A/C were done in 2017. Hot Water Tank was replaced in 2022. Stay dry in the basement with sump pump, back up pump, and back up to the back up gravity system. Welcome Home
